pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, July 15, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local children’s day camp.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with a local family to discuss the Climate Action Incentive payment.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local brewery.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
